title: All the Backlist! January 3, 2020
description:
This week, Liberty discusses two great older books, including White Teeth.
This episode is sponsored by Flatiron Books, publishers of The Lost Man by Jane Harper, now in paperback.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
White Teeth by Zadie Smith
The Rules of Civility by Amor Towles
Catherine House by Elisabeth Thomas
